quoteText:
If you wish to opt out of cross device tracking for purposes of interest-based advertising, you may do so through your Android or Apple device-based settings.

3. Information We Collect at Bose Retail Locations

We use a third-party service provider, RetailNext, to gather mobile and video analytics in Bose retail stores.
title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
